title: Companion Approval Guide
content: get to the Hideout Kill Rugan in the Zhentarim Hideout Find the Missing Shipment Requirement/s: If you Persuade Rugan to hand over the chest to you, Zarys will find out. Once you end up in the Hideout, Rugan will be strapped to a chair tortured and Olly will be dead. You can run a Skill Check (Persuade/Intimidate) in order to convince Zarys to allow you to live and finish the job but you have to kill Rugan.
